name: GONG Agency
description:
GONG (Group One) is an independent digital creative agency, based in Poland. We explore the possibilities of the digital media to help our clients communicate their brands. We create multi-channel campaigns which have digital at the core of the communication strategy. GONG works for local and international clients such as Aviva, Bacardi Martini, Ecco, Scott Sports, Tymbark, Unilever and Orlen.
Marketing, advertising, interactive experience, and advergaming are some of the specialties we have.
